entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
